name: MrCatNapsCloudLED
0:
”Alexa, open cloud light”
”Alexa, ask cloud light teal”
”Alexa, start cloud light”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cloud light
des:
This is an accessory skill, which allows for full control of the Cloud Light. Scenes, brightness, and frames can all be controlled here. All new LED signups should also download the home skill, https://www.amazon.com/Mr-CatNaps-LEDs/dp/B079PQJNTM. This will allow the Cloud light to be a device in Alexa and allow for grouping.

Mr. CatNaps LEDs run off of ESP8266 microcomputers. They connect to the AWS IOT cloud and allow the user to control all the Mr. CatNaps LED functions.
